name: Frank Pedro
description:
I have a great sense of humour, am independent, optimistic, fit and love life, my friends and family. A social butterfly who loves interacting with other people. But, am also equally happy at home on my own with a good book … I really enjoy watching Stormers or Springok rugby games.Enjoy hiking, walking and running … go to the gym only if the weather isn’t great! Love the beach and mountains … enjoy a glass of white or red wine and great company … I have traveled extensively, but still have many places I’d like to explore!
Ideally someone who is active, but enjoys a balance in life …. sincerity and honesty are hugely attractive to me. A sense of humour is vital, not sure you could handle me otherwise 😉 . Someone who loves the outdoors, A lady who is optimistic. Attraction and chemistry is essential.
